original_text: And God called the dry land Earth; and the gathering together of the waters called he Seas: and God saw that it was good.
korean_text: 하나님이 뭍을 땅이라 부르시고 모인 물을 바다라 부르시니 하나님이 보시기에 좋았더라

sentences.original_text: And God called the dry land Earth
and the gathering together of the waters called he Seas
and God saw that it was good
